procedure.title: Determining the name of a custom eventlog container on Windows XP, or Server 2003
procedure.para: To determine the name of a custom eventlog container on Windows XP, or Server 2003, complete the following steps.

step.para: On the client host select Start > Run > regedit.

Navigate to HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\Eventlog\. The custom containers are listed here. For example, the following are valid container names: DFS Replication, File Replication Service, DNS Server.
Use this name as the name of the custom eventlog container during the procedure described in .
